innhold.avsnitt: As a father or co-mother, you can begin your parental benefit period from week seven after birth. If you are adopting, you the parental benefit period will commence when care of the child is assumed.
If you start later, you will receive fewer weeks of the parental benefit.
If it is not convenient to take full leave from work, you can take your parental benefit in combination with partial work or postpone because you are working fulltime.
If the mother receives disability benefit, you can take up to 15 weeks of parental benefit before it is required that the mother has work, studies or is engaged in other activity.
Both when you take the parental benefit or postpone this, the mother must either

liste.punkt: combining study with work that together makes it full-time
be fully dependent on assistance to take care of the child due to sickness
participating fulltime in the Introduction Programme for newly arrived immigrants pursuant to chapter 2 of the Introduction Act
